attributes.action: Step in and do something about the ridiculous rising cost of Energy & Fuels.
attributes.additional_details:
The price of gas and electric have soared yet again in the uk.
The government have a duty to the people to step in and do something. 

It is not a true reflection of their costs. 
They will declare big profits whilst people are suffering now. 

Every one is feeling this now from the elderly down to a newborn baby. 

Energy prices affect EVERY part of life. 
It needs regulating now. 
Enough is enough.

You have kept our lives on hold. We stayed at home. We are PAYING the price everywere.
attributes.background:
The government need to make a move to stop the ridiculous rise in Energy prices. 
It is squeezing every part of everyday living to the max and people are suffering.
Yet the big companies will declare big profits.  
Utilities should be people owned not for profit. 
We are being robbed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The cost of energy is a matter for energy companies, while the energy price cap is a decision for Ofgem.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cut the VAT charged on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597470

Subsidise energy prices to offset any increase in the energy price cap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586
